channel.title: DJ Crucial "In The Zone"
channel.description:
Zone out while I dig into my digital crates.Uncut unedited and raw.From Hip Hop to GoGo to whatever sounds good at the time.It's my show and I play what I like and I like what I play.I think you will too.Check it out!!!
Holla @ me @ crucialparty@gmail.com

item.title: DJ Crucial Demo Mixx 2
item.description: This is another mix I did for another client.This one has more international flavor than the first and minus the oldies.
item.dc:creator: crucial202
item.itunes:summary: This is another mix I did for another client.This one has more international flavor than the first and minus the oldies.

item.title: DJ Crucial Demo Mixx
item.description: This is a mix that I did for a client for a wedding reception. This mix is good for when you have family functions.
item.dc:creator: crucial202
item.itunes:summary: This is a mix that I did for a client for a wedding reception. This mix is good for when you have family functions.

item.title: Experience Unlimited LIVE! "2 Places At The Same Time"
item.description: Before they were "Doin Da Butt",E.U. was holding it down as one of D.C.s top Go-Go bands back in 86'. That's when this album was recorded.This album cranks from beginning to end,so I put up the entire album uncut. This is one of my all time favorite Go-Go albums.I know your gonna love it too.Check it out.
item.dc:creator: crucial202
item.itunes:summary: Before they were "Doin Da Butt",E.U. was holding it down as one of D.C.s top Go-Go bands back in 86'. That's when this album was recorded.This album cranks from beginning to end,so I put up the entire album uncut. This is one of my all time favorite Go-Go albums.I know your gonna love it too.Check it out.

item.title: DJ Crucial Slow Jams
item.description: I dedicate this to all the women of the DMV,and everyone who used to go to Hains point.I've been sitting on this for a minute.This is a mix that will set the mood.Nonstop,no talkovers,just a nice mix of slow joints from back in the day and present day from a grown and sexy perspective.So turn out the lights and press play and get "in the zone."
item.dc:creator: crucial202
item.itunes:summary: I dedicate this to all the women of the DMV,and everyone who used to go to Hains point.I've been sitting on this for a minute.This is a mix that will set the mood.Nonstop,no talkovers,just a nice mix of slow joints from back in the day and present day from a grown and sexy perspective.So turn out the lights and press play and get "in the zone."

item.title: DJ Crucial P.Mixx 39
item.description: I'm back!Sorry it took so long.I had to upgrade some of my s*** but now I'm back on my grizzy.This one might take the title from 38 as one of my favorites.This mix features artist like Luda,The Roots,Rick Ross,Daz,&Prodigy just to name a few.

item.title: DJ Crucial Capital Connection Mixtape
item.description: It's only right that I put this up here.This is a collaboration between Cap Citi, Fam Ent., D.T.A., 2oofly Records, and The Empire. Everybody on here is from the D.C. Metro Area.Shout out to everybody who helped put this together.

item.title: DJ Crucial Stress Reliever
item.description: I thought that I would switch gears and drop this gem.This is what I listen to when I'm in traffic, or washing my truck, or cooking out, or just chillin' doing nothing.No speeding allowed...
item.dc:creator: crucial202
item.itunes:summary: I thought that I would switch gears and drop this gem.This is what I listen to when I'm in traffic, or washing my truck, or cooking out, or just chillin' doing nothing.No speeding allowed...

item.title: DJ Crucial Trouble Funk Tribute!
item.description: Here it is.I got so much music from Trouble Funk that it was kind of difficult to pick which one to play. I got about 4 Trouble Funk albums, one of them is a DOUBLE album and another one is a TRIPLE album! I decided to go with the Trouble Funk "Live In Concert Album". This album came out in the early 80's. This is still not the ENTIRE album because it is loooooong, I don't want to burn yall out.I got a LOT more Go Go coming your way so keep checking in!!
item.dc:creator: crucial202
item.itunes:summary: Here it is.I got so much music from Trouble Funk that it was kind of difficult to pick which one to play. I got about 4 Trouble Funk albums, one of them is a DOUBLE album and another one is a TRIPLE album! I decided to go with the Trouble Funk "Live In Concert Album". This album came out in the early 80's. This is still not the ENTIRE album because it is loooooong, I don't want to burn yall out.I got a LOT more Go Go coming your way so keep checking in!!

item.title: DJ Crucial P.Mixx 38
item.description: This is my latest P.Mixx round up.More of my favorites from all over the country, from major label artist, to unsigned artist trying to make a come up. I think that this is my best P.Mixx to date. I will keep posting all of the other P.Mixx episodes from 38 on down, while I get 39 together. I takes a minute because the last thing that I want to give you is the shit that you hear on the radio EVERYHOUR, EVERYDAY so I'm digging long and hard to find that shit that sits just under the radar.Thanks to everybody that's playin' my shit, needle skips and all.
item.dc:creator: crucial202
item.itunes:summary: This is my latest P.Mixx round up.More of my favorites from all over the country, from major label artist, to unsigned artist trying to make a come up. I think that this is my best P.Mixx to date. I will keep posting all of the other P.Mixx episodes from 38 on down, while I get 39 together. I takes a minute because the last thing that I want to give you is the shit that you hear on the radio EVERYHOUR, EVERYDAY so I'm digging long and hard to find that shit that sits just under the radar.Thanks to everybody that's playin' my shit, needle skips and all.

item.title: DJ Crucial Go Go Mixx Battle of The Bands
item.description: Here is another one for all you Go Go fans.This mix ranges from a 1982 "Little Benny & The Masters" to a 2008 up and coming "Vybe Band". Who wins? Old School or New School? You tell me. Note: Two days after I posted this episode, "Sike Dyke" (Pictured on the left) of Trouble Funk passed away.Trouble Funk is the first band to play on this mix. Robert Michael Reed -aka- Sike Dyke of Trouble Funk passed away from Pancreatic Cancer at the age of 50. For those who don't know, Dyke founded Trouble Funk in 1977. He served as musician and vocals for many Trouble Funk tunes... included probably one of his most notible signature rap delivery in the song "Pump Me Up." R.I.P Dyke. Your music lives on...I'll make sure of that..Look out for my Trouble Funk Tribute.
item.dc:creator: crucial202
item.itunes:summary:
Here is another one for all you Go Go fans.This mix ranges from a 1982 "Little Benny & The Masters" to a 2008 up and coming "Vybe Band". Who wins? Old School or New School? You tell me.
Note: Two days after I posted this episode, "Sike Dyke" (Pictured on the left) of Trouble Funk passed away.Trouble Funk is the first band to play on this mix.
Robert Michael Reed -aka- Sike Dyke of Trouble Funk passed away from Pancreatic Cancer at the age of 50.
For those who don't know, Dyke founded Trouble Funk in 1977. He served as musician and vocals for many Trouble Funk tunes... included probably one of his most notible signature rap delivery in the song "Pump Me Up."
R.I.P Dyke.
Your music lives on...I'll make sure of that..Look out for my Trouble Funk Tribute.

item.title: DJ Crucial P.Mixx 28
item.description: This mix has a lot of melodies.It starts out uptempo then kind of smooths out.I kind of got on some Subsoniq shit.My P.Mixx Series is not always going to be about boosting the crime rate...

item.title: DJ Crucial P.Mixx 37
item.description: This is from my "P.Mixx" Series. "P.Mixx" meaning "Personal Mix". My personal favorites. No fruit snack rap here. I got 36 more and I will post them soon.

item.title: DJ Crucial Go Go Mix Side A
item.description: This is a Go Go mixtape that I did back in 93 but it's timeless.This was recorded with vinyl to a cassette deck. I remastered it and here you go.Side B coming soon. Enjoy
